name: Allied Health Specialist
description: Approachable but professional design for therapists, technicians, and healthcare support staff. Teal accents emphasising skills and patient interaction.

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Experienced physiotherapist with 10+ years providing evidence-based treatment across musculoskeletal, sports, and neurological conditions. AHPRA registered with specialisations in manual therapy and exercise rehabilitation. Passionate about empowering patients to achieve optimal movement and function.

jobs.title: Senior Physiotherapist
bullets: Provide comprehensive physiotherapy assessment and treatment across acute and rehabilitation wards
Specialise in post-surgical rehabilitation and discharge planning for complex cases
Lead student mentoring programme for physiotherapy clinical placements
Achieve 92% patient satisfaction scores and 85% functional improvement outcomes

jobs.title: Physiotherapist - Sports Medicine
bullets: Treated elite and recreational athletes across multiple sports disciplines
Developed injury prevention programmes reducing re-injury rates by 40%
Provided pitch-side medical support for VFL and local sporting competitions
Collaborated with sports physicians, exercise physiologists, and massage therapists

education.degree: Bachelor of Exercise and Sport Science

sections.title: Certifications
certifications: Graduate Certificate in Sports Physiotherapy - University of Melbourne
Dry Needling Certification - Australian Physiotherapy Association
Manual Therapy Level 3 - Manipulative Physiotherapists Association
